tool.name: OTB.ComputeImagesStatistics
tool.description: Computes global mean and standard deviation for each band from a set of images and optionally saves the results in an XML file.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayil True output_data_out $output_data_out name OTB.ComputeImagesStatistics il $il bv $bv ram $ram prefer $prefer response $response outputType_out $OutputSection_out.outputType_out transmissionMode_out $OutputSection_out.transmissionMode_out

param.name: il
param.label: List of input image filenames.
param.help: List of input image filenames. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, jpeg

param.name: bv
param.label: Background value to ignore in computation of statistics.
param.help: Background value to ignore in computation of statistics.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_out
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_out
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This application computes a global mean and standard deviation for each band of a set of images and optionally saves the results in an XML file. The output XML is intended to be used as an input for the TrainImagesClassifier application to normalize samples before learning. You can also normalize the image with the XML file in the ImageClassifier application.
